started doing medics medics is clovers where i do the clovers in the one year and the following year i will do the wheat on the specific same land so i went on a rotation and and it's been brilliant how much life returned to the soil and also with with this change that we made we went into uh we started doing um we got planters where we use the shank so we we try and do minimum disturbance of the soil to try and keep as much moisture as well when we are doing the week here like i said the one years we the next year we have medics the next year we have wheat again and i also do other rotation insect costs and everything as really i think um for me that was my game changer because i i just i just thought to myself i just thought my own eyes that if i wasn't going to make a change i wasn't
